title: Rumored ultra-wide RF-S lens is what Canon APS-C cameras badly need
description: With only three RF-S lenses available, Canon’s APS-C cameras are in real need of better choice. A rumored ultra-wide in the mold of the EF-M 11-22mm would be ideal.

title: Google's plans to revamp search with AI just leaked out
description: Google wants to make search more "personal" and more "snackable", and AI is going to play a significant role.

title: TikTok has some worrying security flaws that could leave your activity open to anyone
description: A threat actor could have stolen sensitive data from vulnerable devices thanks to a flaw in the TikTok app.

title: Leaked Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 5 case images show off its updated design
description: A selection of new images showing off cases for the Galaxy Z Flip 5 confirm what we know about its design.

title: Google IO 2023 – the 7 biggest reveals to expect
description: The Google IO 2023 showcase is right around the corner, and here's what we think Google is going to focus on.

title: Quordle today - hints and answers for Sunday, May 7 (game #468)
description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.
